Make Payments

However. Whenever.

Eyowo is a payment service which allows you to transfer receive money and pay bills using just phone numbers, a mobile app or through a web interface.

Eyowo in action

Eyowo eliminates the hassles associated with making payments online and offline. With Eyowo, you can transfer and receive cash whenever and however.

You no longer have to worry about long queues, tedious processes and crappy internet connectivity.

How Eyowo applies to me

Everyday we make some sort of financial transactions. Whether you are receiving money, transferring or paying bills, you want to be sure your transaction is successful.

How Eyowo applies to users
